buildCommand: echo '[vercel.json] VERCEL_ENV='$VERCEL_ENV' VERCEL_URL='$VERCEL_URL && cd ../.. && if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = "preview" ]; then NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL="https://$VERCEL_URL" turbo run build --filter={apps/web}...; else turbo run build --filter={apps/web}...; fi
installCommand: cd ../.. && corepack enable && bash clone-marketing.sh && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
